resources.string: Copyright Â© 2013 Furfel. All rights reserved.
Thank you for playing Cute Coin Catcher!\nThe aim of the game is to collect as many coins as you can. What\'s also important, you must avoid the blob monster.
You get this number of points for the following objects:
Candies are bonuses which give you some help in gameplay. Every candy eaten adds 10 seconds special time.
Blue candy freezes the blob monster. You still can\'t thouch the monster.
Red candy gives you protection. Monster can\'t do anything to you.
In the infinite mode you play as long as you can.
In time trial you can play only 90 seconds. If you are caught by the monster earlier than the time goes off, your score is not saved even if it\'s higher than least highest score.
This mode has the same rules as time trial, but the only object you can collect are gold coins. There are no rainbow coins nor candies.
To control, tap or move your finger over this field. Both right and left field do the same.
